#summary A description of how the IPT assigns DOIs to datasets

= IPT DOI Workflow =

<wiki:toc max_depth="3" />

== Introduction ==

Since IPT v2.2, the IPT can be configured to use a DataCite or EZID account to manage DOIs for datasets. Publishers have the option of assigning a new DOI to a dataset, or letting the IPT manage an existing DOI for a dataset.
